channel.title: Mistake/Error with Magic On NPC's
channel.description:
Ok, a while back, before the Tutorial section was mass deleted. I added a Magic On NPC's just for ancients, Now however none of my modern magics work, They just keep hitting 0's like my ancients used to do before I added the code.
Can someone re-direct me to a Magic On NPC's (for modern magics) link or help me out? :confused:

item.title: Mistake/Error with Magic On NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

ill post my magic on npcs spells 1 sec.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 05:23:41 PM[/size][hr]if (magicID == 1152 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Wind Strike ProjectileSpell(90, 95, 92, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 2, 1, 566, 558, 1, 1); } if (magicID == 1154 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Water Strike ProjectileSpell(93, 94, 95, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 5, 1, 566, 558, 555, 1, 1, 1); } if (magicID == 1156 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Earth Strike ProjectileSpell(96, 97, 98, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 9, 1, 566, 558, 557, 1, 1, 2); } if (magicID == 1158 && playerLevel[3] >= 80) { // Fire Strike - now Shock Wave ProjectileSpell(448, 100, 481, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 30, 1, 566, 558, 554, 1, 1, 3); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); attackNPCSWithin(453, 30, 4); attackPlayersWithin(453, 30, 4); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); } if (magicID == 1160 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Wind bolt ProjectileSpell(117, 118, 119, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 12, 1, 566, 558, 2, 1); } if (magicID == 1163 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Water bolt ProjectileSpell(120, 121, 122, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 14, 1, 566, 558, 555, 2, 1, 2); } if (magicID == 1166 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Earth bolt ProjectileSpell(123, 124, 125, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 15, 1, 566, 558, 557, 2, 1, 2); } if (magicID == 1169 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Fire bolt ProjectileSpell(126, 127, 128, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 16, 1, 566, 558, 554, 3, 1, 4); } if (magicID == 1172 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Wind blast ProjectileSpell(132, 133, 134, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 17, 1, 566, 560, 3, 1); } if (magicID == 1175 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Water blast ProjectileSpell(135, 136, 137, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 18, 1, 566, 560, 555, 3, 1, 3); } if (magicID == 1177 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Earth blast ProjectileSpell(138, 139, 140, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 19, 1, 566, 560, 557, 3, 1, 3); } if (magicID == 1181 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Fire blast ProjectileSpell(129, 130, 131, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 21, 1, 566, 560, 554, 4, 1, 5); } if (magicID == 1183 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Wind wave ProjectileSpell(158, 159, 160, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 25, 1, 566, 565, 5, 1); } if (magicID == 1185 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Water wave ProjectileSpell(161, 162, 163, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 27, 1, 566, 565, 555, 5, 1, 7); } if (magicID == 1188 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Earth wave ProjectileSpell(164, 165, 166, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 29, 1, 566, 565, 557, 5, 1, 7); } if (magicID == 1189 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Fire wave ProjectileSpell(155, 156, 157, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 27, 1, 566, 565, 554, 5, 1, 7); }
add this under 1 of your existing magicID spells.
